mapper.select: select * from tb_user order by user_no desc
select o.order_no, o.order_date, u.user_id, i.item_name, o.order_state from tb_order o, tb_item i, tb_user u where o.user_no = u.user_no and o.item_no = i.item_no order by o.order_no desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_item(item_no, item_type, item_name, item_price, item_stock, item_img, item_info_img) values (tb_item_seq.nextval, #{item_type}, #{item_name}, #{item_price}, #{item_stock}, #{item_img}, #{item_info_img})
mapper.select: select board.*, item.item_name from tb_board board, tb_item item where board.item_no = item.item_no and board.board_kind = 2
mapper.update: update tb_order set order_state = #{order_state} where order_no = #{order_no}

update tb_item set item_type = #{item_type}, item_name = #{item_name}, item_price = #{item_price}, item_stock = #{item_stock}, item_img = #{item_img}, item_info_img = #{item_info_img} where item_no = #{item_no}
mapper.select: select board.*, item.item_name from tb_board board, tb_item item where board.item_no = item.item_no and board.board_no = #{board_no}
mapper.update: update tb_board set board_reply = #{board_reply} where board_no = #{board_no}
